net.jordaria.entity

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jordaria.entity.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains slots for items and methods for modifying the contents.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      InventorySlot[] slots 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Inventory(int slots)
      Constructs a new Inventory with the given amount of slots.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(Item item)
      Adds the item to the first available InventorySlot, if possible.
      void addItemStack(ItemStack items)
      Combines the ItemStack with the first available stack, if possible.
      int getSize()
      Returns how many slots the inventory contains.
      InventorySlot getSlot(int index)
      Returns the InventorySlot in the given index, if it exists.
      boolean isFull()
      Returns true if the inventory has no empty slots, false otherwise.
